project2

Class NumberGameArrayList

  • java.lang.Object
    • project2.NumberGameArrayList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    project2.NumberSlider

    public class NumberGameArrayList
extends java.lang.Object
implements project2.NumberSlider
    This class will have all basic functions of a 1024 game. It will be able to perform shifting tiles, undo moves, return game states, and formating board.
    Version:
    09-05-2018
    Author:
    Jason Rupright
